title: Start
body:
<<detachFrom Renata Mia>>
<<moveToX Renata Mia -15 40>>
<<moveUp Mia 15 40>>
<<moveToY Renata Mia 0 40>>
Mia: His trail goes...off this cliff?
Renata: I think we can hop this. Let's go!
<<decoupleMovementAndAnimation Renata>>
<<moveDown Renata 5 10>>
<<moveUp Renata 5 60>>
<<coupleMovementAndAnimation Renata>>
<<moveUp Renata 10 60>>
<<faceLeft Mia>>
Mia-miaangryface: Hey!
<<faceRight Renata>>
Renata: What?
Mia-miaangryface: You'll break your leg!
Renata: Ok, fine. Let's look for another way down.<<attachTo Renata Mia>>
